title: Litany In Honour Of St. Aloysius Gonzaga # 1
content:
LITANY OF
SAINT ALOYSIUS # 1
Lord, have mercy.
Lord, have mercy.
Christ, have mercy.
Christ, have mercy.
Lord, have mercy.
Lord, have mercy.
Christ, hear us.
Christ, hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
God, the Father of heaven,
have mercy on us.
God the Son, Redeemer of the world,
have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Spirit,
have mercy on us
Holy Trinity, One God,
have mercy on us.
St. Aloysius, filled with the Holy Spirit,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, beloved friend of Jesus Christ,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, devout adorer of the Blessed Sacrament,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, honor and glory of youth,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, radiant light of the Church,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, faithful servant of the Blessed Virgin,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, example of humility,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, lover of poverty,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, full of obedience,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, with your admirable patience,
Pray for us.
St. Aloysius, powerful advocate in Heaven,
Pray for us.
Lamb of God, Who takes away the sins of the world,
spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takes away the sins of the world,
graciously hear us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takes away the sins of the world,
have mercy on us.
Pray for us, O Holy Mother of God,
That we may be worthy of the promises of Christ.
